channel.title: 联邦调查局 on ECTHRwatch
channel.description: Recent content in 联邦调查局 on ECTHRwatch

item.title: 联邦调查局
item.description: 联邦调查局 I am going to seek Victim Assistance and witness protection from the Federal Bureau of Investigation. I am going to explain in further details why later. I also intend to ask for witness protection to the European Court of Human Rights and to the Chinese Central Government. You can read my open letters to the F.B.I. on zh.Federal-Bureau-of-Investigation.com (非官方网站).

item.title: Adam Rogalski
item.description: Adam Rogalski 联邦调查局 Assistant Legal Attaché My communications to Mr. Rogalski are published on Adam-Rogalski.zh.Federal-Bureau-of-Investigation.com.

item.title: 克里斯托弗·亞瑟·雷 (英語：Christopher Asher WRAY)
item.description: 克里斯托弗·亞瑟·雷 (Christopher Asher WRAY) Check carefully who monitors the F.B.I. since Christopher Asher WRAY declared, if I am not mistaken, that he had a financial stake in McDonalds Corporation. Possible conflict of interests. Therefore, just to be safe, I should also notify other officials. It’s one of the biggest fraud in history. We can’t leave anything to chance. For
